alert.note: Alert for Arlington; City of Fairfax; City of Manassas; City of Manassas Park; Culpeper; Fairfax; Fauquier; Loudoun; Prince William; Stafford (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 07 at 5:14PM EDT until August 07 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Sterling Virginia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Stafford County in northern Virginia... South central Loudoun County in northern Virginia... The City of Fairfax in northern Virginia... West central Arlington County in northern Virginia... Central Fairfax County in northern Virginia... Southeastern Fauquier County in northern Virginia... Central Culpeper County in northern Virginia... The City of Manassas Park in northern Virginia... Prince William County in northern Virginia... The City of Manassas in northern Virginia... * Until 600 PM EDT. * At 514 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near South Riding to near Culpeper, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damaging winds will cause some trees and large branches to fall. This could injure those outdoors, as well as damage homes and vehicles. Roadways may become blocked by downed trees. Localized power outages are possible. Unsecured light objects may become projectiles. * Locations impacted include... Centreville, Dale City, Reston, Annandale, Fairfax, Culpeper, Vienna, Falls Church, Warrenton, Mantua, Pimmit Hills, Mclean, American Legion Bridge, Lake Ridge, Burke, Linton Hall, Oakton, Chantilly, Tysons Corner and Wolf Trap. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for central Maryland...and northern Virginia. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Arlington; City of Fairfax; City of Manassas; City of Manassas Park; Culpeper; Fairfax; Fauquier; Loudoun; Prince William; Stafford
